name: Azure Storage SAS Token
description: Detects Azure Shared Access Signature (SAS) tokens commonly leaked in URLs.

name: Google OAuth Client Secret
description: Detects Google OAuth client secrets within JSON or config files.

name: GitLab Personal Access Token
description: Detects GitLab personal access tokens that start with 'glpat-'.

name: Bitbucket App Password
description: Detects Bitbucket app passwords used for API access.

name: CircleCI Token
description: Detects CircleCI API tokens often exposed in CI/CD scripts.

name: Terraform Cloud Token
description: Detects Terraform Cloud API tokens starting with 'atlasv1.'.

name: PagerDuty Token
description: Detects PagerDuty integration tokens often used for incident automation.

name: Twilio API Key
description: Detects Twilio API keys starting with 'SK' followed by 32 hex characters.

name: Mailgun API Key
description: Detects Mailgun API keys used for email services.

name: Cloudflare API Token
description: Detects Cloudflare API tokens or global keys.

name: Heroku API Key
description: Detects Heroku API keys and account tokens.

name: DigitalOcean API Token
description: Detects DigitalOcean personal access tokens starting with 'dop_v1_'.

name: Infura API Key
description: Detects Infura project URLs containing embedded API keys.

name: Cloud Provider Generic Key
description: Detects generic cloud-related secret keys with provider indicators.
